CatDescriptText: Cutline from article published on the St. Benedict the Moor church website www.stbenedictthemoor.org/our_history (accessed May 18, 2009), reads: "On November 24, 1968, as a result of a monumental effort on the part of the parish, Bishop John J. Wright dedicated the famous landmark statue of Saint Benedict the Moor designed by the noted artist Frederick Shrady."
TitMainTitle: Construction workers welding left arm of statue of St. Benedict the Moor suspended from crane, before placement on top of St. Benedict the Moor Catholic Church, 91 Crawford Street Hill District
